member.name: M:Arachnode.Utilities.Files.ExtractFilesAndInsertFilesMetaData(System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Extracts Files and Images from the database, saves to disk and updates File and Image MetaData according to ApplicationSettings. This method is provided for retroactively performing tasks that may have been disabled during crawling.

member.name: T:Arachnode.Utilities.Resources

member.name: M:Arachnode.Utilities.Web.ClearIECache
member.summary: Clears all browinsg data and files. If this method appears to run indefinitely ensure that no browser are open/streaming data...
